instructions: Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Content Rating . Review information about the questionnaire and type your email address. Your email address will be used for correspondence with IARC. Click Continue . Select a category. Complete the questionnaire. To change any of your responses after you ve completed a section, click Edit . If you ve started taking the questionnaire and want to finish later, click Save draft . Each app can have one draft questionnaire at a time. Click Calculate app rating . On your ratings summary page, click Apply rating to my app .
